msContents.summary: Account of tax payments by a minimum of 9 people made through the largest payer, one Aion

msItem.note: Written along the fibers with 21 lines; the back is blank
The hand is large and proficient; the ink is a little faded

provenance.p: Purchased by Columbia University from Mr. Blanchard through H.I. Bell in 1924; no. 40 in Bell's inventory
